bug.author: DNXie
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/sparse/concat>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/sparse/concat</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The signature of API doesn't have argument <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24580222/102425051-90d17a80-3fda-11eb-88fb-8da8d44f381c.png></denchmark-link>
But in the Argument section, it describes argument <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24580222/102425085-a34bb400-3fda-11eb-8d57-5834a8a9f9a7.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>System information</denchmark-h>
Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): No OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): MacOS Mojave 10.14 TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): binary TensorFlow version (use command below): 2.3.0 Python version: 3.7.6

comments.comment: Added a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/46040>#46040</denchmark-link> for the fix.
